fields.description: Indicates whether or not adding or removing accounts is disabled.
fields.name: AccountsBlockModification

fields.description: Specifies the list of managed apps with app details and its associated delegated scope(s). This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: AndroidDeviceOwnerDelegatedScopeAppSettings

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the user is allowed to enable to unknown sources setting.
fields.name: AppsAllowInstallFromUnknownSources

fields.description: Indicates the value of the app auto update policy. Possible values are: notConfigured, userChoice, never, wiFiOnly, always.
fields.name: AppsAutoUpdatePolicy

fields.description: Indicates the permission policy for requests for runtime permissions if one is not defined for the app specifically. Possible values are: deviceDefault, prompt, autoGrant, autoDeny.
fields.name: AppsDefaultPermissionPolicy

fields.description: Whether or not to recommend all apps skip any first-time-use hints they may have added.
fields.name: AppsRecommendSkippingFirstUseHints

fields.description: A list of managed apps that will have their data cleared during a global sign-out in AAD shared device mode. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: AzureAdSharedDeviceDataClearApps

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block a user from configuring bluetooth.
fields.name: BluetoothBlockConfiguration

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block a user from sharing contacts via bluetooth.
fields.name: BluetoothBlockContactSharing

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to disable the use of the camera.
fields.name: CameraBlocked

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block Wi-Fi tethering.
fields.name: CellularBlockWiFiTethering

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block users from any certificate credential configuration.
fields.name: CertificateCredentialConfigurationDisabled

fields.description: Indicates whether or not text copied from one profile (personal or work) can be pasted in the other.
fields.name: CrossProfilePoliciesAllowCopyPaste

fields.description: Indicates whether data from one profile (personal or work) can be shared with apps in the other profile. Possible values are: notConfigured, crossProfileDataSharingBlocked, dataSharingFromWorkToPersonalBlocked, crossProfileDataSharingAllowed, unkownFutureValue.
fields.name: CrossProfilePoliciesAllowDataSharing

fields.description: Indicates whether or not contacts stored in work profile are shown in personal profile contact searches/incoming calls.
fields.name: CrossProfilePoliciesShowWorkContactsInPersonalProfile

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block a user from data roaming.
fields.name: DataRoamingBlocked

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block the user from manually changing the date or time on the device
fields.name: DateTimeConfigurationBlocked

fields.description: Represents the customized detailed help text provided to users when they attempt to modify managed settings on their device.
fields.name: DetailedHelpText

fields.description: Indicates the location setting configuration for fully managed devices (COBO) and corporate owned devices with a work profile (COPE). Possible values are: notConfigured, disabled, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: DeviceLocationMode

fields.description: Represents the customized lock screen message provided to users when they attempt to modify managed settings on their device.
fields.name: DeviceOwnerLockScreenMessage

fields.description: Android Device Owner Enrollment Profile types.
fields.name: EnrollmentProfile

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the factory reset option in settings is disabled.
fields.name: FactoryResetBlocked

fields.description: List of Google account emails that will be required to authenticate after a device is factory reset before it can be set up.
fields.name: FactoryResetDeviceAdministratorEmails

fields.description: Proxy is set up directly with host, port and excluded hosts.
fields.name: GlobalProxy

fields.description: Indicates whether or not google accounts will be blocked.
fields.name: GoogleAccountsBlocked

fields.description: IndicatesÂ whether a user can access the device's Settings app while in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskCustomizationDeviceSettingsBlocked

fields.description: Whether the power menu is shown when a user long presses the Power button of a device in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskCustomizationPowerButtonActionsBlocked

fields.description: Indicates whether system info and notifications are disabled in Kiosk Mode. Possible values are: notConfigured, notificationsAndSystemInfoEnabled, systemInfoOnly.
fields.name: KioskCustomizationStatusBar

fields.description: Indicates whether system error dialogs for crashed or unresponsive apps are shown in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskCustomizationSystemErrorWarnings

fields.description: Indicates which navigation features are enabled in Kiosk Mode. Possible values are: notConfigured, navigationEnabled, homeButtonOnly.
fields.name: KioskCustomizationSystemNavigation

fields.description: Whether or not to enable app ordering in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeAppOrderEnabled

fields.description: The ordering of items on Kiosk Mode Managed Home Screen. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: KioskModeAppPositions

fields.description: A list of managed apps that will be shown when the device is in Kiosk Mode. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: KioskModeApps

fields.description: Whether or not to alphabetize applications within a folder in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeAppsInFolderOrderedByName

fields.description: Whether or not to allow a user to configure Bluetooth settings in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeBluetoothConfigurationEnabled

fields.description: Whether or not to allow a user to easy access to the debug menu in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeDebugMenuEasyAccessEnabled

fields.description: Exit code to allow a user to escape from Kiosk Mode when the device is in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeExitCode

fields.description: Whether or not to allow a user to use the flashlight in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeFlashlightConfigurationEnabled

fields.description: Folder icon configuration for managed home screen in Kiosk Mode. Possible values are: notConfigured, darkSquare, darkCircle, lightSquare, lightCircle.
fields.name: KioskModeFolderIcon

fields.description: Number of rows for Managed Home Screen grid with app ordering enabled in Kiosk Mode. Valid values 1 to 9999999
fields.name: KioskModeGridHeight

fields.description: Number of columns for Managed Home Screen grid with app ordering enabled in Kiosk Mode. Valid values 1 to 9999999
fields.name: KioskModeGridWidth

fields.description: Icon size configuration for managed home screen in Kiosk Mode. Possible values are: notConfigured, smallest, small, regular, large, largest.
fields.name: KioskModeIconSize

fields.description: Whether or not to lock home screen to the end user in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeLockHomeScreen

fields.description: A list of managed folders for a device in Kiosk Mode. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedFolders

fields.description: Whether or not to automatically sign-out of MHS and Shared device mode applications after inactive for Managed Home Screen.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenAutoSignout

fields.description: Number of seconds to give user notice before automatically signing them out for Managed Home Screen. Valid values 0 to 9999999
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenInactiveSignOutDelayInSeconds

fields.description: Number of seconds device is inactive before automatically signing user out for Managed Home Screen. Valid values 0 to 9999999
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenInactiveSignOutNoticeInSeconds

fields.description: Complexity of PIN for sign-in session for Managed Home Screen. Possible values are: notConfigured, simple, complex.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenPinComplexity

fields.description: Whether or not require user to set a PIN for sign-in session for Managed Home Screen.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenPinRequired

fields.description: Whether or not required user to enter session PIN if screensaver has appeared for Managed Home Screen.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenPinRequiredToResume

fields.description: Custom URL background for sign-in screen for Managed Home Screen.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenSignInBackground

fields.description: Custom URL branding logo for sign-in screen and session pin page for Managed Home Screen.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenSignInBrandingLogo

fields.description: Whether or not show sign-in screen for Managed Home Screen.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedHomeScreenSignInEnabled

fields.description: Whether or not to display the Managed Settings entry point on the managed home screen in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeManagedSettingsEntryDisabled

fields.description: Whether or not to allow a user to change the media volume in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeMediaVolumeConfigurationEnabled

fields.description: Screen orientation configuration for managed home screen in Kiosk Mode. Possible values are: notConfigured, portrait, landscape, autoRotate.
fields.name: KioskModeScreenOrientation

fields.description: Whether or not to enable screen saver mode or not in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeScreenSaverConfigurationEnabled

fields.description: Whether or not the device screen should show the screen saver if audio/video is playing in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeScreenSaverDetectMediaDisabled

fields.description: The number of seconds that the device will display the screen saver for in Kiosk Mode. Valid values 0 to 9999999
fields.name: KioskModeScreenSaverDisplayTimeInSeconds

fields.description: URL for an image that will be the device's screen saver in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeScreenSaverImageUrl

fields.description: The number of seconds the device needs to be inactive for before the screen saver is shown in Kiosk Mode. Valid values 1 to 9999999
fields.name: KioskModeScreenSaverStartDelayInSeconds

fields.description: Whether or not to display application notification badges in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeShowAppNotificationBadge

fields.description: Whether or not to allow a user to access basic device information.
fields.name: KioskModeShowDeviceInfo

fields.description: Whether or not to use single app kiosk mode or multi-app kiosk mode. Possible values are: notConfigured, singleAppMode, multiAppMode.
fields.name: KioskModeUseManagedHomeScreenApp

fields.description: Whether or not to display a virtual home button when the device is in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeVirtualHomeButtonEnabled

fields.description: Indicates whether the virtual home button is a swipe up home button or a floating home button. Possible values are: notConfigured, swipeUp, floating.
fields.name: KioskModeVirtualHomeButtonType

fields.description: URL to a publicly accessible image to use for the wallpaper when the device is in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeWallpaperUrl

fields.description: Whether or not to allow a user to configure Wi-Fi settings in Kiosk Mode.
fields.name: KioskModeWiFiConfigurationEnabled

fields.description: The restricted set of WIFI SSIDs available for the user to configure in Kiosk Mode. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: KioskModeWifiAllowedSsids

fields.description: Indicates whether or not LocateDevice for devices with lost mode (COBO, COPE) is enabled.
fields.name: LocateDeviceLostModeEnabled

fields.description: Indicates whether or not LocateDevice for userless (COSU) devices is disabled.
fields.name: LocateDeviceUserlessDisabled

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block unmuting the microphone on the device.
fields.name: MicrophoneForceMute

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to you want configure Microsoft Launcher.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherConfigurationEnabled

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the user can modify the wallpaper to personalize their device.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherCustomWallpaperAllowUserModification

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to configure the wallpaper on the targeted devices.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherCustomWallpaperEnabled

fields.description: Indicates the URL for the image file to use as the wallpaper on the targeted devices.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherCustomWallpaperImageUrl

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the user can modify the device dock configuration on the device.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherDockPresenceAllowUserModification

fields.description: Indicates whether or not you want to configure the device dock. Possible values are: notConfigured, show, hide, disabled.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherDockPresenceConfiguration

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the user can modify the launcher feed on the device.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherFeedAllowUserModification

fields.description: Indicates whether or not you want to enable the launcher feed on the device.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherFeedEnabled

fields.description: Indicates the search bar placement configuration on the device. Possible values are: notConfigured, top, bottom, hide.
fields.name: MicrosoftLauncherSearchBarPlacementConfiguration

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the device will allow connecting to a temporary network connection at boot time.
fields.name: NetworkEscapeHatchAllowed

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block NFC outgoing beam.
fields.name: NfcBlockOutgoingBeam

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the keyguard is disabled.
fields.name: PasswordBlockKeyguard

fields.description: List of device keyguard features to block. This collection can contain a maximum of 11 elements.
fields.name: PasswordBlockKeyguardFeatures

fields.description: Indicates the amount of time that a password can be set for before it expires and a new password will be required. Valid values 1 to 365
fields.name: PasswordExpirationDays

fields.description: Indicates the minimum length of the password required on the device. Valid values 4 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumLength

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of letter characters required for device password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumLetterCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of lower case characters required for device password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumLowerCaseCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of non-letter characters required for device password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumNonLetterCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of numeric characters required for device password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumNumericCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of symbol characters required for device password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumSymbolCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of upper case letter characters required for device password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: PasswordMinimumUpperCaseCharacters

fields.description: Minutes of inactivity before the screen times out.
fields.name: PasswordMinutesOfInactivityBeforeScreenTimeout

fields.description: Indicates the length of password history, where the user will not be able to enter a new password that is the same as any password in the history. Valid values 0 to 24
fields.name: PasswordPreviousPasswordCountToBlock

fields.description: Indicates the timeout period after which a device must be unlocked using a form of strong authentication. Possible values are: deviceDefault, daily, unkownFutureValue.
fields.name: PasswordRequireUnlock

fields.description: Indicates the minimum password quality required on the device. Possible values are: deviceDefault, required, numeric, numericComplex, alphabetic, alphanumeric, alphanumericWithSymbols, lowSecurityBiometric, customPassword.
fields.name: PasswordRequiredType

fields.description: Indicates the number of times a user can enter an incorrect password before the device is wiped. Valid values 4 to 11
fields.name: PasswordSignInFailureCountBeforeFactoryReset

fields.description: Indicates whether the user can install apps from unknown sources on the personal profile.
fields.name: PersonalProfileAppsAllowInstallFromUnknownSources

fields.description: Indicates whether to disable the use of the camera on the personal profile.
fields.name: PersonalProfileCameraBlocked

fields.description: Policy applied to applications in the personal profile. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: PersonalProfilePersonalApplications

fields.description: Used together with PersonalProfilePersonalApplications to control how apps in the personal profile are allowed or blocked. Possible values are: notConfigured, blockedApps, allowedApps.
fields.name: PersonalProfilePlayStoreMode

fields.description: Indicates whether to disable the capability to take screenshots on the personal profile.
fields.name: PersonalProfileScreenCaptureBlocked

fields.description: Indicates the Play Store mode of the device. Possible values are: notConfigured, allowList, blockList.
fields.name: PlayStoreMode

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to disable the capability to take screenshots.
fields.name: ScreenCaptureBlocked

fields.description: Represents the security common criteria mode enabled provided to users when they attempt to modify managed settings on their device.
fields.name: SecurityCommonCriteriaModeEnabled

fields.description: Indicates whether or not the user is allowed to access developer settings like developer options and safe boot on the device.
fields.name: SecurityDeveloperSettingsEnabled

fields.description: Indicates whether or not verify apps is required.
fields.name: SecurityRequireVerifyApps

fields.description: Indicates whether or not location sharing is disabled for fully managed devices (COBO), and corporate owned devices with a work profile (COPE)
fields.name: ShareDeviceLocationDisabled

fields.description: Represents the customized short help text provided to users when they attempt to modify managed settings on their device.
fields.name: ShortHelpText

fields.description: Indicates whether or the status bar is disabled, including notifications, quick settings and other screen overlays.
fields.name: StatusBarBlocked

fields.description: List of modes in which the device's display will stay powered-on. This collection can contain a maximum of 4 elements.
fields.name: StayOnModes

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to allow USB mass storage.
fields.name: StorageAllowUsb

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block external media.
fields.name: StorageBlockExternalMedia

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block USB file transfer.
fields.name: StorageBlockUsbFileTransfer

fields.description: Indicates the annually repeating time periods during which system updates are postponed. This collection can contain a maximum of 500 elements.
fields.name: SystemUpdateFreezePeriods

fields.description: The type of system update configuration. Possible values are: deviceDefault, postpone, windowed, automatic.
fields.name: SystemUpdateInstallType

fields.description: Indicates the number of minutes after midnight that the system update window ends. Valid values 0 to 1440
fields.name: SystemUpdateWindowEndMinutesAfterMidnight

fields.description: Indicates the number of minutes after midnight that the system update window starts. Valid values 0 to 1440
fields.name: SystemUpdateWindowStartMinutesAfterMidnight

fields.description: Whether or not to block Android system prompt windows, like toasts, phone activities, and system alerts.
fields.name: SystemWindowsBlocked

fields.description: Indicates whether or not adding users and profiles is disabled.
fields.name: UsersBlockAdd

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to disable removing other users from the device.
fields.name: UsersBlockRemove

fields.description: Indicates whether or not adjusting the master volume is disabled.
fields.name: VolumeBlockAdjustment

fields.description: If an always on VPN package name is specified, whether or not to lock network traffic when that VPN is disconnected.
fields.name: VpnAlwaysOnLockdownMode

fields.description: Android app package name for app that will handle an always-on VPN connection.
fields.name: VpnAlwaysOnPackageIdentifier

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block the user from editing the wifi connection settings.
fields.name: WifiBlockEditConfigurations

fields.description: Indicates whether or not to block the user from editing just the networks defined by the policy.
fields.name: WifiBlockEditPolicyDefinedConfigurations

fields.description: Indicates the number of days that a work profile password can be set before it expires and a new password will be required. Valid values 1 to 365
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordExpirationDays

fields.description: Indicates the minimum length of the work profile password. Valid values 4 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumLength

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of letter characters required for the work profile password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumLetterCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of lower-case characters required for the work profile password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumLowerCaseCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of non-letter characters required for the work profile password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumNonLetterCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of numeric characters required for the work profile password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumNumericCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of symbol characters required for the work profile password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumSymbolCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the minimum number of upper-case letter characters required for the work profile password. Valid values 1 to 16
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordMinimumUpperCaseCharacters

fields.description: Indicates the length of the work profile password history, where the user will not be able to enter a new password that is the same as any password in the history. Valid values 0 to 24
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordPreviousPasswordCountToBlock

fields.description: Indicates the timeout period after which a work profile must be unlocked using a form of strong authentication. Possible values are: deviceDefault, daily, unkownFutureValue.
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordRequireUnlock

fields.description: Indicates the minimum password quality required on the work profile password. Possible values are: deviceDefault, required, numeric, numericComplex, alphabetic, alphanumeric, alphanumericWithSymbols, lowSecurityBiometric, customPassword.
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordRequiredType

fields.description: Indicates the number of times a user can enter an incorrect work profile password before the device is wiped. Valid values 4 to 11
fields.name: WorkProfilePasswordSignInFailureCountBeforeFactoryReset
